description: Steve Jobs admired the cube as a design. The Power Mac G4 Cube shows this in its DNA, and pays homage to the NeXTcube from Steve Jobs computer company before he rejoined Apple. Join Ken, Druaga1, and Stephen Hackett from 512 Pixels, as they explore this vintage Mac.  Get more vintage Apple tech!   Dont miss future tech videos!   Want a chance to be featured?
